launcher.title: Translate
launcher.description: Create template files that you can translate

infohub_translate_createfile.LISTS_ALL_CLIENT_PLUGINS_THAT_CAN_HAVE_T: Lists all client plugins that can have translation files. Select a plugin and click create file.
infohub_translate_createfile.YOU_CAN_WRITE_THE_PLUGIN_NAME_HERE_IF_IT: You can write the plugin name here if it is missing from the list. Only startable plugins are in the list.
infohub_translate_createfile.YOU_GET_THE_ENGLISH_TRANSLATION_FILE._KE: You get the english translation file.
infohub_translate_createfile.YOU_CAN_THEN_USE_THAT_FILE_ON_ONLINE_TRA: You can then use that file on online translation services to translate it to other languages.

infohub_translate_updateplugin.LISTS_ALL_CLIENT_PLUGINS_THAT_CAN_HAVE_T: Lists all client plugins that can have translation files.
Select a plugin and click update plugin.
infohub_translate_updateplugin.YOU_CAN_WRITE_THE_PLUGIN_NAME_HERE_IF_IT: You can write the plugin name here if it is missing from the list.
infohub_translate_updateplugin.ONLY_STARTABLE_PLUGINS_ARE_IN_THE_LIST._: Only startable plugins are in the list.
infohub_translate_updateplugin.THE_PLUGIN_YOU_SELECT_WILL_HAVE_ITS_TRAN: The plugin you select will have its translate text converted to a key string.
infohub_translate_updateplugin.PLUGIN_AND_CHILDREN_UPDATED._SEE_FOLDER:: Plugin and children updated. See folder:

infohub_translate_validate.LISTS_ALL_CLIENT_PLUGINS_THAT_CAN_HAVE_T: Lists all client plugins that can have translation files.
infohub_translate_validate.SELECT_A_PLUGIN_AND_CLICK_VALIDATE._KEY: Select a plugin and click validate.
infohub_translate_validate.YOU_CAN_WRITE_THE_PLUGIN_NAME_HERE_IF_IT: You can write the plugin name here if it is missing from the list.
infohub_translate_validate.ONLY_STARTABLE_PLUGINS_ARE_IN_THE_LIST._: Only startable plugins are in the list.
infohub_translate_validate.VALIDATES_THE_TRANSLATION_FILES_FOR_THE_: Validates the translation files for the selected plugins.
